summary: This mod adds a new race called Northman, it changes the starting spells and voice of your character and  adds a new rollplaying background how you ended up in skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
REQUIREMENTS

Beards by Hvergelmir: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363
Brows by Hvergelmir: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411


DESCRIPTION

This mod adds a race called Northman. Its very similar to nords but has some slightly changes. 
The reason i made this mod is becouse its a small part of a much bigger mod im developing but not finished yet. 

Starting spells: Berserker Rage and frost resistance. 

Skill Bonus: Archery 5 One-handed 10 Block 5 Smithing 5 Speech 5 Light Armor 5 Total points : 35 (Standard) 

Changes the player voice to Malebrute. 

When you enter Helgen casle with the stormcloaks, there is lying a journal
on the table in front of you, When you read it you will learn what happend and
how you ended up in skyrim. 


HISTORY:

The Vikings were the North Germanic explorers, warriors, merchants, and pirates who raided, traded, explored and settled in wide areas of Europe, Asia and the North Atlantic islands from the late 8th to the mid-11th century.[1]
The Vikings used their famed longships to travel as far east as Constantinople and the Volga River in Russia, and as far west as Iceland, Greenland, and Newfoundland, and as far south as Nekor.[2] This period of Viking expansion – known as the Viking Age – forms a major part of the medieval history of Scandinavia, Great Britain, Ireland and the rest of Medieval Europe.


INSTALLATION

Automatic Download with NMM
Click the Download with manager button on top of the file.
Northman race will appear in in NMM\\\'s Mods list once it\\\'s downloaded. Double-click the Northman race entry to Activate it.

OR

Manual Download with NMM
Start NMM and click on Mods.
In the left icon bar, click on Add Mod From File and select the downloaded archive file.
Northman race will now appear in the list. Double-click to Activate it.

OR

Manual Installation
Locate the Data/ folder in your Skyrim installation directory. Typically it\\\'s found at Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/.
Extract the contents of the downloaded archive file to your Data/ folder.
In the Skyrim Launcher, select Data Files and enable Northman race.esp.


RECOMENDED MODS:
the armors and weapons you see on the pictures does not come with the mod and i dont claim any content from them to be mine.

Here is a list of all armor and weapon mods:

Norse Mail 2-13462-2-0
Conan The Barbarian
Northman Armours
Viking Weaponry
The Chronicles of Steel 
Warchief Armor
Midguarder weapon mod
Einherjar Armor
Vagabond Armor
nb-furhoods
Viking Chainmail Armor
pontys chainmail
Raider Helmet
Northman Knight Helm Retextured - GOLD Valsgarde

First Picture by ~kanartist watch hes art at: http://kanartist.deviantart.com/art/viking-106288709

CREDITS

Hvergelmir for hes work with the beard and brow mods.

Tags:

Vikings, northmen, northman, berserk, berserker, berzerker, viking race, northman race, nordic warrior, pagan, norse, norsemen, rune, viking age
